entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022
